author: Kevin Malone
quote: You're too charactery to be a lead, and you're not fat enough to be a great character actor.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: This is a documentary? Ohhhh. I always thought we were like specimens in a human zoo.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: I go to the bathroom for 45 minutes and everything changes.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: Mini-cupcakes? As in the mini version of regular cupcakes? Which is already a mini version of cake?

author: Kevin Malone
quote: I do deserve a vacation. Sometimes Batman's gotta take off his cape.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: A fluke is one of the most common fish in the sea, so if you go fishing for a fluke, chances are you just might catch one.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: I'm gonna get in my car. When I start dying I will honk the horn three times. That means save the dog.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: I love banter, but I hate witty banter.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: I have very little patience for stupidity.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: Who started the rumor that there is another person inside of me working me with controls?

author: Kevin Malone
quote: Oscar, I'm now going to be prone to surges.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: It's Michael versus Stanley, and it is the clash of the titans.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: Oh no, it's bad. It's real bad. It's like eating a hot circle of garbage.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: I just want to lie on the beach and eat hot dogs. That's all I've ever wanted.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: I hear Angela's party will have double fudge brownies. But it will also have Angela.

author: Kevin Malone
quote: I got myself in secret santa. I was supposed to tell somebody... but I didn't.
